body_html: SGTM -- I think @caisq is the person to ask here, since he wrote this build script. In particular, I think there's a correct set of params to pass there to get precisely what you want: maybe just GPU and NO for the first two?
body_text: SGTM -- I think @caisq is the person to ask here, since he wrote this build script. In particular, I think there's a correct set of params to pass there to get precisely what you want: maybe just GPU and NO for the first two?
body: SGTM -- I think @caisq is the person to ask here, since he wrote [this build script](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/docker/parameterized_docker_build.sh). In particular, I think there's a correct set of params to pass there to get precisely what you want: maybe just `GPU` and `NO` for the first two?
